channel.title: Need good coder for my server or someone who will teach me how to code
channel.description:
Hello, some of you may remember my server and if you have great coding experience please pm me on moparisthebest.com/smf. and tell me and then I will see if you would be a good help. Oh and also I need a coder for both servers or just one coder that can code both (non pk and pk servers.)
Also, I need someone to teach me coding, I know I will not learn it in one day but it would be very much appreciated if someone would teach me as I said in the first request I would very much like it if you pmed me.
Thank you very much, shadow hearts
Attention any moderators or administrators for www.moparisthebest.com/smf if this is wrong section for this I would like it if you moved this into the right section, instead of deleting this topic or locking it, thank you very much, shadow hearts.[br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2006, 06:45:36 PM[/size][hr]ffs cmon somebody.[br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2006, 07:28:16 PM[/size][hr]anyone? the benefits are adminship on my server.
